turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Starbucks espresso beverage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a tall espresso, with sugar and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 722 Sullivan Rd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
